sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian forces are making steady gains in apparent military setbacks in their counteroffensive along the Donetsk and Zaporizhia front lines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Russia reports 17 deaths on the Russian-controlled side of the Dnipro River following the explosion of the Kharkov Dam one week ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: As Ukraine's counteroffensive against Russia gets underway, Kiev's allies express their support while warning it won't be over quickly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The EU takes an important step towards improving the working conditions of platform workers as the bloc's Labour ministers overcome months of impasse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukraine says it's making slow but steady progress in its push against Russian forces, but it's tough going.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Its soldiers appear to have retaken the Donetsk village of Mararivka, the latest in a string of gains across the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Analysts say these small breakthroughs could allow Ukraine to build a platform for a wider thrust into Russian-held territory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: For residents still living in frontline areas, the recent escalation has brought more hardship and fear. In the past week, Kyiv has stepped up efforts from several directions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: However, it has not yet dispatched the main counter-offensive force that it has been building for months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And there have been apparent setbacks for President Zelensky's military.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russia's Defense Ministry has released video footage of what it claims are Russian troops repelling a Ukrainian assault in Donetsk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Elsewhere, the recent destruction of several Western tanks and military vehicles is seen as a propaganda coup for the Kremlin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The death toll from the collapse of the Ukrainian Kharkov Dam one week ago continues to rise.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Russian authorities report that 17 people are dead on the Russian-controlled side, while 10 are dead on the Ukrainian side, which many more are still missing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: They have destroyed our crop lands, they have destroyed our crop lands.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It's been ten years and nothing will grow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The environmental service, the community The environmental situation is broken.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Yuri, a 56-year-old farmer, now walks around his village of Athanyskivivka with water up to his neck.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: He too is also writing off the harvest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: If the government can, they will help.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: If they can't, they will ask our soldiers to help them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: On the Ukrainian side, doctors working for the Israeli-Ukrainian humanitarian organization Frida have provided medical assistance to more than 900 patients.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Russia and Ukraine have blamed each other for the blowing up of the dam, which has left the Dnipro River at Zaporizhia in ruins.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: Kyiv also claims that Russian troops are looting evacuated villages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Just a few days into Ukraine's counteroffensive against Russia, Kyiv's allies say it's too early to say exactly how it's going.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But their message is one of support, while also stating there will likely be heavy losses on both sides.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken is clear about the significance of the moment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's success in the counteroffensive would do two things.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: It would strengthen its position at any negotiating table that emerges, and it may have the effect as well of actually causing Putin to finally focus on negotiating an end to the war that he started.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: French President Emmanuel Macron, qui porte des discussions avec les leaders de la Allemagne et de la Pologne à Paris, dit que la contre-offensive pourrait prendre des semaines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Elle a été préparée avec soin, méthode, par une armée de dirigeants qui ont montré depuis un peu plus d'un an leur détermination, leur bravoure et l'excellence de leur sens tactique et de leur organisation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Et donc cette offensive a vocation à se déployer sur plusieurs semaines, voire plusieurs mois.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: En même temps, en Russie, le président Vladimir Poutine a marqué le jour de la Russie avec une apparence rare, visant des soldats blessés dans le conflit de l'Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Il a été annoncé qu'il disait que c'était un moment difficile pour le pays. Russia Day with a rare appearance, visiting soldiers wounded in the Ukraine conflict. It was reported that he said this was a difficult time for the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: After months at a standstill, the EU is taking an important step towards improving the working

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: conditions of platform workers. On Monday, the bloc's Labour ministers reached an agreement that could eventually grant drivers and delivery riders a certain number of rights.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The deal, if finalised, would establish that platform and gig workers must fulfil three out of seven criteria in order to be considered employees.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: These include the ability to fix the amount of money for a ride, turning down work or choosing their own appearance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: If they're considered employees, they will be entitled to labor rights like paid holiday and sick leave.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The agreement also reduces the power of algorithms that the platforms use to distribute tasks and preferences in the allocation of time slots.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But five countries, including Germany and Spain, say it's not ambitious enough and hope that during the next steps, which are the negotiations with the European Parliament, push the agreement forward.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And unions share the same view.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: It's for sure less ambitious because it's discussing about putting extra hurdles with three criteria and not two criteria.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: It's also discussing about the possibility to have national derogations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: So it's not taking the first principle of the objective of the Commission proposal is granting the rights of workers that they deserve.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The battle and intense lobbying by companies like Uber is only set to continue, as they still believe the text does not give them enough certainty.

The city's tram network said it has suspended all services. Chief Constable Kate Maynall has described it as a horrific and tragic incident. Their maternal grandparents say it was the children's knowledge of which fruit and seeds in the jungle are edible that was key to their survival.

sentences.sentence: US actor Treat Williams has died aged 71 after suffering critical injuries from a motorcycle crash in Vermont.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Williams had been a prominent figure in Hollywood since the 1970s and was perhaps best known for his Golden Globe-nominated performance in the film adaptation of the musical Hair. His career spanned almost half a century and also included starring roles in Once Upon a Time in America, Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead and TV series Everwood. sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: of energy security was actively discussed at the Astana International Forum Kazakhstan one of the world's most important oil producers, is aiming to increase its supply to and influence over the energy market.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Kazakhstan supplies 8% of Europe's oil needs, about 20% of Europe's uranium needs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: We now are the largest uranium producer and exporter in the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: We used to have a nuclear power plant in the past.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: We now are thinking about developing peaceful nuclear industry in Kazakhstan, given the abundance of resources that we have. I would also mention green hydrogen, which is another source of energy. And this is an industry where we see fascinating growth and fascinating interest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: European investors have been showing interest in the region's renewables.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: French energy giant Total Energies has signed a power purchase agreement to construct a gigascale wind farm in Kazakhstan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Euronews asked the CEO of Total Energies about the energy challenges.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: First is security of supply.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: We are lucky to have a good weather this winter, but next winter again, if the weather is cold, we could face a security of supply issue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: On the gas side, of course, we have a lack of storage, then affordability.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: For Europe, you know, we changed our era.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: We went from a price of energy which was fundamentally subsidized by Russian gas, low cost, to a price of energy which is higher. So of course gas, low cost, to a price of energy which is higher. So of course it's a challenge for all manufacturing industries. And then sustainability, because we want a green deal. By the way, we can ensure security of supply with more renewables, there are local energies. So that's a challenge, and I think for Europe we have entered into a new era where we need to face political leaders to balance the three challenges I just described.
